tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: happy with doctor she is friendly explained well everything is good.. but the issue is when she prescribe medicines she suggest or write which is available what is avail in the next medical shop only, you wont get that medicine even if you search in whole Bangalore that's big time draw back by this doctor even after requesting her so much *** **** *** **** ******* ********** didn't feel like to take prescribe by this doctor sometimes s.  other than that she explains well and good, she is friendly, but 80% she will be late to clinic. that might be from her professional reasons but she wont give on time wait time. needs to understand patients convenient as well but she wont understand. other than that she is all good..

tags: None
review:
Dr.Varalakshmi: As the very name suggests is truly a blessing as a doctor. My 9 months of pregnancy journey was a cake walk under her care and guidance. The amount of compassion, composure and kindness that the doctor possesses is no less than a MOTHER. In all my 30 yrs of life I had not seen a gyno until I conceived. ******* ****** ******* * *** *********** *** **** ************** ** *** **** ** *
Apart from being a doctor, Dr.Varalakshmi has a calm and charming personality that makes you go back to her hear those reassuring words. My husband and I are today the proud parents of a cute little baby girl... cheers..Thanks a lot doctor... :)
Ashwini Aravind

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We really had a very warm experience, that was our first visit, we felt comfortable and convenient within no time. She is very friendly, calm and composed. Doctorâ€™s demeanor has really put us at ease, we highly recommend Varalakshmi Madam.
Great doctor. *** ** ************** caring, expertise and informative. 

Overall experience at our first visit itself is excellent

review: Very pleasant experience. It was my first visit, but felt comfortable within no time. Inspite of long history, Doctor listened to me patiently and instilled confidence while understanding my condition. No unnecessary tests and clear instructions provided. Thank you doctor.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Varalakshmi is one of the best Gyno I have ever consult , she has deep knowledge and wide experience of most  common parental/fetal anomalies and treatment .
To add more as human being she is so kind, humble and approachable. Appreciate for her explanation towards  treatment .

Thank you so much mam.....
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gynae Problems,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Horrible experience.
My wife started visiting her in order to get pregnant. All the days she kept giving us other dates to come and tablets . She did not ask us to perform any tests related to the problem , *** ******* ***** **** **** ********* ****** * ****** **** *** *********** After a huge wait if not booked in practo, she sees you only for few minutes and charges the fee. We visited 6-7 times ******* *** ******** just spending money and time.
**** ** ********** ** *** ****** *** *** *** **** ********** ***** **** ** ******* *** ****** ********* ****** * ******* **** ** *** ******** **** ***** **** ** ** *** **** ******** ** * **** *****
We started visting sumati nursing home and observed the difference in treatment. We saw the results only after 2 visits with proper guidance and help.
Will never ever visit varasiddhi clinic in future.
reply_text: If you are not satisfied donâ€™t come to my clinic better donâ€™t comment worse ðŸ˜¡

tags: Wait time,
review:
My wife had gone for a checkup and the appointment was booked at 11:30 AM this morning. While the doctor may be good/great/exceptional in her domain, it does not matter when there is NO concern for peopleâ€™s time. It was after 1.5 hours, the doctor came with no regrets.

For a five min check up, despite booking an appointment one had to wait for 1.5 hours. Unacceptable and I will NOT recommend such a doctor who does not care for her patients time. 

Think twice and if you can wait for a day, itâ€™s your call!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good doctor I had ever seen. Very much friendly. When I got pregnant with polycyst I was very much tensed all the time about my pregnancy. That time she stay beside me. Gave me mental support like my parents. Not only that when I was in OT table for c-section she hold my hands and told "don't worry Pooja all will be perfect". When a doctor say like this only one patient can tell how much happy she is. Today I am happy mother with my 3mnth baby girl. My father is an also renowned gynecologist but after that also I decided that I will do my operation with vara laxmi mam only. That much trust I have on her.                                        Thank you                           From. - Pooja

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Today I'm having my son with normal delivery because of her. I'm very thankful to her throughout my journey of pregnancy.. Her friendly approach and care towards patients is good.. Thank you mam for wonderful experience with you throughout my pregnancy..
